replies.body: Wow it is like way over half a year since I saw the last stoneplate
I build it every now and then, it allows me to stay alive more than 0.5 sec in team fights... as a tank :)

> [{quoted}](name=Hügö,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FsZo10Vy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-11T19:55:10.752+0000)
>
> Wow it is like way over half a year since I saw the last stoneplate

Yeah I never build it, nor hardly see it in soloQ.  But in pro, there is multiple of them every game with enormous effect.
It's not even good except on a select few champs.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FsZo10Vy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-12T03:36:45.405+0000)
>
> It's not even good except on a select few champs

it is situationally amazing in pro
